creator: Higher Education Strategy Associates
title: 2.8: Universidad Nacional Autónoma de México (UNAM) — Selecting a Rector
author: Higher Education Strategy Associates
content:encoded: Today's guest is Marion Lloyd, a higher education researcher at UNAM, and she’s here today to give a tour of UNAM’s electoral system, the behind-the-scenes power politics that accompanies this process and handicaps the current race which is coming to a head in the next week or so.
